price: তাত সিহঁতে শীতল (বস্তুৰ) সোৱাদ গ্ৰহণ কৰিব নোৱাৰিব, লগতে উপযুক্ত পানীও নাপাব।
arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā bardan walā sharāban
